attributes.action: Convene a cross party committee to strategically manage the pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
We have the worst per capita national debt worldwide.
The worst per capita infection rates world wide.
The second worst per capita death rate world wide.
NHS and front line workers are suffering unprecedented stress levels,
Citizens are unemployed through no fault of their own.
Children are starving.
The future looks bleak as complications with the economy become increasingly difficult.
People need honesty and a degree of belief that there is a unified , considered response to these crisis
attributes.background:
Establish a credible, cross party working committee to plan for the management of the current pandemic and future direction of the UK.
A considered and strategic planning to support the country and its people to recover and to believe the future.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551504

It's not clear how a cross-party Committee to plan for the management of the current pandemic and future direction of the UK would differ in practice from a Government of all parties.
